channel.title: Home Brew Beer
channel.description: Recent content on Home Brew Beer

item.title: How to get started home brewing beer - beer from a kit
item.description:
Kit I found an excellent YouTube Video - making beer from kits by the guys at brewuk.co.uk. I ended up buying the same kit from https://www.the-home-brew-shop.co.uk/ because they had faster customer service (brewuk didn’t respond to an initial email)
Starter Kit: Woodfordes Wherry Microbrewery from the-home-brew-shop for £72 and 10 extra CO2 bottles for an extra £5. This is one of the most popular starting kits which is a classic bitter of around 4-5%
